Name: Vanarana
Title: Abidance of the Forested Path
Desc: "Enter the memories of the trees in the forest, descend into seedbeds sprouting the dreams of slumbering leaves, and dive into a world free of woes."

Talent.Name: Vanarana
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Collect up to 2 unused Elemental Dice.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When the Action Phase begins:</color> Reclaim the dice you collected using this card.
